content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree on a final price because I believe my apartment is worth more than the highest price the potential tenant was willing to offer.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8. He was respectful, reasonable, and showed a willingness to negotiate fairly.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended because the negotiation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner. The potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, did not make any discriminatory or offensive remarks.
name: Peter Schmidt
